Name: Jade Vault
Script: On Execute: var item=actualdice[0].basevalue; if(item==1){ giveequipment(~Jade Calculator~[;]true[;]false[;]e); } if(item==2){ giveequipment(~Jade Machine~[;] true[;] false[;] e); } if(item==3){ giveequipment(~Jade Blade~[;] true[;] false[;] e); } if(item==4){ giveequipment(~Jade Skull~[;] true[;] false[;] e); } if(item==5){ giveequipment(~Jade Pendant~[;] true[;] false[;] e); } if(item==6){ giveequipment(~Jade Clock~[;] true[;] false[;] e); }

Name: Jade Calculator
Description: Bump unused dice[;] twice | [grey](Vault relocks after combat)
Script: On Execute: var c = 0; var extradice = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ if (mydice.basevalue >= 5){ extradice.push(1); if(mydice.basevalue >= 6){ extradice.push(1); } mydice.animatereroll(6[;] self.screenposition()[;] c * 0.05); } else { mydice.animatereroll((mydice.basevalue + 2)[;] self.screenposition()[;] c * 0.05); } c++; } } givedice(extradice);

Name: Jade Calculator_downgraded
Description: Bump unused dice  | [grey](Vault relocks after combat)
Script: On Execute: var c = 0; var extradice = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ if (mydice.basevalue >= 6){ extradice.push(1); mydice.animatereroll(6[;] self.screenposition()[;] c * 0.05); } else { mydice.animatereroll((mydice.basevalue + 1)[;] self.screenposition()[;] c * 0.05); } c++; } } givedice(extradice);

Name: Jade Calculator_upgraded
Description: Bump unused dice twice[;]|Return this dice | [grey](Vault relocks after combat)
Script: On Execute: var c = 0; var extradice = [d]; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ if (mydice.basevalue >= 5){ extradice.push(1); if(mydice.basevalue >= 6){ extradice.push(1); } mydice.animatereroll(6[;] self.screenposition()[;] c * 0.05); } else { mydice.animatereroll((mydice.basevalue + 2)[;] self.screenposition()[;] c * 0.05); } c++; } } givedice(extradice);

Name: I'm Outta Here!
Description: Odd: flee[;] Even: win|(for testing only)
Script: On Execute: if(d%2 == 0){ attack(999); sfx(~_shield~); } else { flee(); sfx(~_shield~); }

Name: All Out Attack
Description: Throw your dice[;]| do [sword]2 damage for each
Script: On Execute: for(mydice in self.dicepool){ if(mydice.available()){ mydice.removedice(self.screenposition()); attack(2); } }

Name: All Out Attack_upgraded
Description: Throw your dice[;]| do [sword]2 damage for each | ([sword]3 on [dice]>3)
Script: On Execute: var dmg=0; for(mydice in self.dicepool){ if(mydice.available()){ if(mydice.basevalue>=4){ dmg=3; }else{ dmg=2; } mydice.removedice(self.screenposition()); attack(dmg); } }

Script: On Execute: for(mydice in self.dicepool){ if(mydice.available()){ mydice.removedice(self.screenposition()); attack(1); } }

Name: High Stakes
Script: On Execute: var dicelist = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ dicelist.push(mydice); } } if(dicelist.length > 0) { shuffle(dicelist); givedice(dicelist[0].basevalue); attack(d); adjustrobotcounter(dicelist[0].basevalue); }
Script: On any equipment use: if( e.availablethisturn == false){ e.animate(~flashandshake~); e.availablethisturn = true; }

Script: On Execute: var outcome = []; for(i in 1 ... d) { outcome.push(i); } if(d<=1){ givedice(1); }else{ givedice(rand(outcome)); }

Script: On Execute: var dicelist = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available() && mydice.basevalue != d){ dicelist.push(mydice); } } if(dicelist.length > 0) { shuffle(dicelist); dicelist[0].animatereroll(d[;] self.screenposition()[;] 0); } givedice(d);
Script: On Start Turn: var give = []; if(chance(25)){ give = shuffle([~Combat Key~[;]~Combat Lock~[;]~Combat Doppel~[;]~Combat Spanner~]); } else{ give=shuffle([~Combat Roll@SDD~[;]~Combat Spatula@SDD~[;]~Combat Bump~[;]~Combat Nudge~]); } self.replaceskillcard(give[0]);

Name: Redeal
Script: On Execute: var eqlist = []; for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.skillcard == ~~ && !eq.ready ){ trace(eq.name + eq.size); eqlist.push(eq.size); } } var neweq = ~~; for(size in eqlist){ if(size == 2) { neweq = rand(getparticularequipment([~large~])); } else { neweq = rand(getparticularequipment([~small~])); } giveequipment(neweq); }

Description: Give Bullet|Obtain a Silver Bullet[;]|Restore old skill card

Name: Drake@nospacet
Description: NOSPACE|Restore your Skill Card|(this should not appear)

Name: Inspired
Description: INSPIRATION|Delete the first card|in your hand this combat
Script: On Execute: var list = self.getvar(~inspired~); var firstcard = Deck.getcard(0); if(firstcard != null){ trace(firstcard.name); list.append(firstcard.name); self.setvar(~inspired~[;]list); firstcard.delete(); }

Name: Megabump
Script: On Execute: var c = 0; var extradice = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ if (mydice.basevalue >= 6){ extradice.push(1); mydice.animatereroll(6[;] self.screenposition()[;] c * 0.05); } else { mydice.animatereroll((mydice.basevalue + 1)[;] self.screenposition()[;] c * 0.05); } c++; } } givedice(extradice);

Script: On Execute: var c = Deck.getcard(2); trace(c); trace(c.name); trace(c.equipment.name); giveequipment(c.equipment.name[;] true[;] false[;] e);

Name: Hammer@Crisis
Script: On Execute: attack(d[;] SHOCK); if(d == 6) inflict(SHOCK); if(d < 6) { sfxdamage(target[;]d); } else { sfxdamage(target[;]d); sfx(~_shock~[;]~~[;]0.2); }

Name: Program
Script: On Execute: var v = rand([1[;]2[;]3[;]4[;]5[;]6]); var c = ~cpu~; givedice(v); inflictself(c[;]v); if(getstatusself(c)==self.getvar(~jpot~)){ self.replaceskillcard(~Jackpot!~); sfx(~jackpot_autoroll~); }else{ if(getstatusself(c)>self.getvar(~jpot~)){ for(eq in self.equipment){ eq.animate(~error~); } }else{ self.replaceskillcard(~Program~); } }
Script: On Start Turn: for(mydice in self.dicepool){ mydice.consumedice(); } var dtotal=self.dice+self.extradice+self.bonusdice; trace(dtotal); self.setvar(~jpot~[;]5+2*dtotal); trace(self.getvar(~jpot~)); if(getstatusself(SILENCE)>0){ removestatusself(SILENCE[;]ALL); } e.fulldescription = ~CALCULATE\n[cog]CPU target: ~ + self.getvar(~jpot~);

Name: Hocus Rocus
Script: On Execute: var eqlist = []; for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.skillcard == ~~ ){ trace(eq.name + eq.namemodifier); eqlist.push(eq.name + eq.namemodifier); } } trace(eqlist.length); if(eqlist.length<d){ givedice(d); self.textparticle(~Dice Doesn't Fit!~); } else{ self.replaceskillcard(eqlist[d-1]); }

Name: Inspire
Description: REWORK|Disable one of your equipment[;]|get a gadget from it
Script: On Execute: var gadgets = [~Barricade~[;]~Flash Freeze~[;]~Blowtorch~[;]~Megabump~[;]~Jackhammer~[;]~Stardust~[;]~Arctic Storm~[;]~Power Up~[;]~Refrigerator~[;]~Protection~[;]~Dramatic Pause~[;]~Stardust~]; var eqlist = []; for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.skillcard == ~~ && eq.ready ){ trace(eq.name + eq.equipmentcol); eqlist.push(eq); } } eqlist=shuffle(eqlist); if(eqlist.length>0){ trace(eqlist[0].equipmentcol); eqlist[0].availablethisturn=false; self.replaceskillcard(gadgets[eqlist[0].equipmentcol]); }else{ self.textparticle(~No effect!~); }

Name: Stardust
Script: On Execute: inflict(rand([CURSE[;] LOCK[;] FIRE[;] ICE[;] WEAKEN[;] SHOCK[;] POISON]));

Name: Power Up
Script: On Execute: var randomstatus = rand([SHIELD[;]FURY[;]REDUCE[;]REEQUIPNEXT[;]DODGE]); var a = 1; if (randomstatus == SHIELD) a = 4; if (randomstatus == REDUCE) a = 2; inflictself(randomstatus[;] a);

Name: Candy
Description: Heal [heal]2. If above max hp[;]|convert excess to shield
Script: On Execute: if(self.maxhp - self.hp == 0) { inflictself(SHIELD[;] 2); sfx(~_shield~[;]~~[;]0.2); } else if(self.maxhp - self.hp == 1) { inflictself(SHIELD[;] 1); attackself(-1); sfx(~_shield~[;]~~[;]0.2); } else { attackself(-2); sfx(~_heal~); }

Name: Candy_upgraded
Description: Heal [heal]3. If above max hp[;]|convert excess to shield
Script: On Execute: if(self.maxhp - self.hp == 0) { inflictself(SHIELD[;] 3); sfx(~_shield~[;]~~[;]0.2); } else if(self.maxhp - self.hp == 1) { inflictself(SHIELD[;] 2); attackself(-1); sfx(~_shield~[;]~~[;]0.2); } else if(self.maxhp - self.hp == 3) { inflictself(SHIELD[;] 1); attackself(-2); sfx(~_shield~[;]~~[;]0.2); } else { attackself(-3); sfx(~_heal~); }

Name: Trash
Description: SCRAP|Scrap one of the other|cards in your hand
Script: On Execute: var gadgets = [~Barricade~[;]~Flash Freeze~[;]~Blowtorch~[;]~Megabump~[;]~Jackhammer~[;]~Stardust~[;]~Arctic Storm~[;]~Power Up~[;]~Refrigerator~[;]~Protection~[;]~Dramatic Pause~[;]~Stardust~]; var eqlist = []; for(x in [0[;]1[;]2[;]3]){ if(Deck.getcard(x)!=null&&Deck.getcard(x).equipment.name!=~Trash~){eqlist.push(x);}} var y = rand(eqlist);  giveequipment(gadgets[Deck.getcard(y).equipment.equipmentcol][;] true[;] false[;] e); Deck.getcard(y).delete();

Name: Calm Mind
Script: Before Combat: if (self.getvar(~calm_script_active~) != 1) {for (eq in self.equipment) {if (eq.name != ~Calm Mind~) { eq.scriptbeforeexecute = ~if(getstatusself(\~calm\~) > 0){++e.totalusesremaining; e.animate(\~flash\~); removestatusself(\~calm\~|1);}~ + eq.scriptbeforeexecute; trace(eq.scriptbeforeexecute);}} self.setvar(~calm_script_active~|1);}
Script: After Combat: for (eq in self.equipment) {if (eq.name != ~Calm Mind~) { eq.scriptbeforeexecute = eq.scriptbeforeexecute.substr(125); trace(eq.scriptbeforeexecute.length);}} self.setvar(~calm_script_active~|0);

Name: Trick
Script: On Execute: var myoffer = [[]|[]]; var theiroffer = [[]|[]]; var mygive=~~; var mytake=~~; var n=3; if(self.equipment.length==1){self.textparticle(~Nice Try.~);}else{for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.skillcard == ~~ && eq.ready ){ trace(eq.name); myoffer[eq.size-1].push(eq.name); } }} for(eq in target.equipment){ trace(eq.name); theiroffer[eq.size-1].push(eq.name); } if(myoffer[0].length==0#theiroffer[0].length==0){n=1;}else{if(myoffer[1].length==0#theiroffer[1].length==0){n=0;}else{if(!(myoffer[0].length==0&&theiroffer[1].length==0)#(myoffer[1].length==0&&theiroffer[0].length==0)){n=rand([0|1]);}}} mygive=rand(myoffer[n]); mytake=rand(theiroffer[n]); trace(mytake+mygive); removeequipment(mygive|self); removeequipment(mytake|target); giveequipment(mytake|false|false); giveenemyequipment(mygive|false|false);

Name: Bullseye Staff
Script: On Execute: var total = 0; for(x in e.dicehistory){total+=x.basevalue;}; if(total == e.countdown){attack(8);}else{attack(4);}

Name: Glass Whip
Script: On Execute: attack(d | FIRE); if(d == 1) inflict(FIRE); if(d > 1) { sfxdamage(target|d); } else { sfxdamage(target|d); sfx(~_fire~|~~|0.2); }

Name: Longsword
Script: On Execute: var bigdice = 0; var smalldice = 7; for(ad in actualdice) { if(ad.basevalue > bigdice) bigdice = ad.basevalue; if(ad.basevalue < smalldice) smalldice = ad.basevalue; } if((bigdice - smalldice) >= 1) { attack((2 * bigdice) - smalldice); }

Name: Longsword_upgraded
Script: On Execute: var bigdice = 0; var smalldice = 7; for(ad in actualdice) { if(ad.basevalue > bigdice) bigdice = ad.basevalue; if(ad.basevalue < smalldice) smalldice = ad.basevalue; } if((bigdice - smalldice) >= 1) { attack((2 * bigdice) - smalldice); } if((2 * bigdice) - smalldice == 11){inflict(LOCK); sfx(~_lock~|~~|0.2);}

Name: Throwing Star
Script: On Execute: var temp = 0; var statuslist=[POISON|FIRE|BLIND|SHOCK|WEAKEN|ICE]; for(dx in self.dicepool) { if(dx.available()){temp++; inflict(statuslist[dx.basevalue-1]);}} for(i in 0 ... temp){throwdice(self|target|i*0.01);}

Name: Throwing Star_upgraded
Script: On Execute: var temp = 0; var statuslist=[POISON|FIRE|BLIND|SHOCK|WEAKEN|ICE]; for(dx in self.dicepool) { if(dx.available()){temp++; dx.animate(~fire~); inflict(statuslist[dx.basevalue-1]);}} for(i in 0 ... temp){throwdice(self|target|i*0.01);}

Name: Rainbow Cannon
Script: On Execute: var dmg = 10; var clist = []; for(dx in e.dicehistory){if(clist.indexOf(dx.basevalue) == -1){ clist.push(dx.basevalue);} } if(clist.length==6){dmg=dmg*2;} attack(dmg); sfxdamage(target|dmg);

Name: Rainbow Cannon_upgraded
Script: On Execute: var dmg = 14; var clist = []; for(dx in e.dicehistory){if(clist.indexOf(dx.basevalue) == -1){ clist.push(dx.basevalue);} } if(clist.length==6){dmg=dmg*2;} attack(dmg); sfxdamage(target|dmg);

Name: Rainbow Cannon_downgraded
Script: On Execute: var dmg = 5; var clist = []; for(dx in e.dicehistory){if(clist.indexOf(dx.basevalue) == -1){ clist.push(dx.basevalue);} } if(clist.length==6){dmg=dmg*2;} attack(dmg); sfxdamage(target|dmg);

Name: Blank Ring
Script: On Execute: var dicelist = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ dicelist.push(mydice); } } if(dicelist.length > 0) { givedice(dicelist[dicelist.length-1].basevalue); }

Name: Broken Lock
Script: On Execute: var a = []; var x = d; while(x > 1){ a.push(2); x-=2; }; givedice(a[;]~splitdice~);

Name: Blank Ring_upgraded
Script: On Execute: var dicelist = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ dicelist.push(mydice); } } if(dicelist.length > 0) { givedice(dicelist[dicelist.length].basevalue+1); }

Name: Unmarked Key
Script: On Execute: var dicearray = []; var flag = 0; for(mydice in self.dicepool){if(mydice.available){if(mydice.basevalue == d){if(flag == 0){flag = 1;}else{dicearray = dicearray.concat(7-d); mydice.removedice(self.screenposition());};};};}; givedice(dicearray);

Description: A curious dagger|Get a reward if [blind]

Name: Puzzle Box_upgraded
Script: On Execute: var tick=self.getvar(~tick~); if(d==tick){if(tick==2){giveequipment(~Precious Trinket~|true|false); giveequipment(~Precious Trinket~|true|false); self.setvar(~tick~|12); sfx(~levelup~); self.equipment.remove(e);}else{self.setvar(~tick~|d-1); self.textparticle(~Click!~);}} givedice([actualdice[0].basevalue|actualdice[1].basevalue]);

Name: Puzzle Box_weakened
Script: On Execute: var tick=self.getvar(~tick~); if(d==tick){if(tick==2){giveequipment(~Precious Trinket~|true|false); giveequipment(~Precious Trinket~|true|false); self.setvar(~tick~|12); sfx(~levelup~); self.equipment.remove(e);}else{self.setvar(~tick~|d-1); self.textparticle(~Click!~);}} givedice([actualdice[0].basevalue|actualdice[1].basevalue]);

Name: Precious Trinket
Script: On Execute: var eqlist = []; var spaceused=0; for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.skillcard == ~~ ){ trace(eq.name + ~+~); eqlist.push(eq); spaceused+=size;} } trace(eqlist.length); if(eqlist.length<d){ givedice(d); self.textparticle(~Less than ~+d+~ Equipment!~); } else{ if(spaceused+eqlist[d-1].size>7){givedice(d); self.textparticle(~Not Enough Space!~);}else{giveequipment(eqlist[d-1].name + ~+~|true|false|e)} ; }

Description: Boost countdowns by [charge]|Take damage to charge

Description: Boost countdowns by [charge]|Take damage to charge

Name: Loot
Script: On Execute: bonus(1000); self.gold += 1; target.gold -= 1; if(target.gold < 0) target.gold = 0; screenshake();
